attributes.action: Review the way the government has responded to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
During these terrible times due to the number of deaths and the hit on the economy. The population is suffering. We need clear leadership - someone when faced with a threat will tackle it head on and not give poor amateur advice. The government has said one thing after the other that fails to protect the population and most of all is a contradiction. 
All processes from the beginning needs to be reviewed and all guilty parties need to be held accountable.
attributes.background:
We the British public call for a review on the way the government has handled COVID-19. 
Boris Johnson has been extremely indecisive and has not managed to make a strategic plan on how to tackle the virus, instead he wanted us to live with it (COVID-19)
